title: Typeface in logo that reminds me of Trajan
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fineartschamberplayerslogo_4577.JPG)

Have a project for a client that doesn't have a vector format of the logo.

Not going to try and redraw the illustration...but would love to at least use the wordmark below.

Having trouble identifying the typeface. Reminds me of Trajan. I'm sure the N and R in a few instances are customized.

Just wondering if this rings a bell for anyone.

Thanks all.

Font: 

 Friz Quadrata 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317201938/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
